name: PROJECT XENO
description: PROJECT XENO is a tactics PvP game that combines the essence of "GameFi," "e-sports," and "Fun." This is a game that players can play, simply have fun, and earn (Play, Fun, and Earn). In other words, players are able to earn while having fun and playing this game. Players who own an NFT character called XENO can earn the token and NFTs by winning the battles. The basic game cycle in the game is training, battles, and drops. The number of tokens earned increases as the player goes through the cycle. The earned NFTs are seamlessly tradable in the marketplace developed by PROJECT XENO.
